EmailTemplate.name: Reception Graduation Ceremony-Parking 23/06/2014
EmailTemplate.subject: Reception Graduation Ceremony-Parking 23/06/2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Guangzhou 点击此处查看中文版本
Dear Reception Parents, If you are able to join us for tomorrow’s Reception Graduation Ceremony please note that once the car park above school is full, you will be directed to park in the G Block car park. Please can we also request that you do not park in any parking spaces that are reserved for residents. Thank you for your support with this and we shall look forward to seeing you tomorrow. Kind regards, Miss Kathy Head of Lower School The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education
____________________________________________________________
